Text: Thank you for this surprise, it is a stereo version! Imdb still says that sound mix is mono, and all film channels have only sent mono versions of this film, diminishing all the beautiful music.

Ant please edit and tag this post so that it can be found at
http://thepiratebay.org/tag/Mikhail+Baryshnikov
and
http://thepiratebay.org/tag/shirley+maclaine
and
http://thepiratebay.org/tag/ballet

Sorry for the nag, but tags with names only work with word space. The + is added by the search function. Tags should be separated by commas. Here, you should enter
Mikhail Baryshnikov,Shirley MacLaine
Click them afterwards to see if they work. Took me some time to figure out, too.

I've always loved Anne B., but she's amazing in this picture. A great movie in a great quality. 10/10

Thanks so very much for this post.

Kind regards,

Alexey
Thanks .. I love this film... really appreciate the download.. cheers
